########################################################################### # Settings to configure the Zookeeper application. ###########################################################################
[zookeeper]
[[clusters]]
[[[default]]] # Zookeeper ensemble. Comma separated list of Host/Port. # e.g. localhost:2181,localhost:2182,localhost:2183 host_ports=localhost:2181
# The URL of the REST contrib service (required for znode browsing). rest_url=http://localhost:9998
# Name of Kerberos principal when using security. principal_name=zookeeper
